item.description:
Everyone loves the feeling of being in love! Kirtan is just that, a practice of “being love” for no specific reason. Join us as we joyously chant mantras musically vibrating with love to celebrate the fullness of life. Accompanied by harmonium, guitar and tabla drums, we will enjoy a creative group expression of sound, music and meditation through call and response, no previous experience is necessary. Kirtan is from the yogic traditions of India; it is believed, that celebrating truly supports us living a well-balanced vital life!

 

$15-$20 love offering

www.vitallifecenter.org
item.name: Autumn Equinox with Jayaprabha and the Cuckoo Kirtan Whalas
